name: Dicetris (ThubyDev)
description:
Dicetris - The dice based stacking puzzle game.

Made in 48 hours, for the Game Maker's Toolkit Jam 2022

Credits:
Game Design: Camilla Wang Kvalheim (instagram @camillatorisk)
Game Design & Programming: Oliver Andreas Thunæs (twitter @xthuby)
Art: Gina Amanda Alvestad Johannesen (gina.amanda3@gmail.com)
Music: Alexander Espeseth

Keyboard controls:
Left/Right or A/D - Move left and right
Up/W - Hold
Down/S - Soft drop
Space - Hard drop
Esc - Exit to menu

Gamepad controls:
D-pad left/right - Move left and right
LB - Hold
D-pad down - Soft drop
RB - Hard drop
Start - Exit to menu
